caption.p:
( A) PC1 and PC2 of HA, type A–D Influenza viruses, the scaled value ( n = 18). ( B) HA of the type A virus. The numbers indicate the viral subtypes ( n = 59). ( C) HA of the H1 subtype ( n = 387). The M and R groups include the human pandemic 2009 Mexico and 1977 Russia viruses, respectively. Black, human; green, swine, and blue, avian. The orange-coloured “H” in the M group is one of the strains classified as the “triple reassortant”
8 . The H in the U group is the human virus found in Switzerland (NCBI taxonomy ID: 940568).
